author: gareth
msg: Problems using make tarball under linux. Patch by Steven White.
1) Seperate lines in a Makefile are run in seperate shells, thus
'cd' on a line on it's own is a NOOP.
2) When using GNU tar the produced tarfile had full paths starting from
3) When creating include directories: child directories were created
but not the parent, which doesn't work without 'mkdir -p'
